salaryExpectations: LKR 80,000 (Graduate Engineer) to LKR 850,000+ (Senior Consultant/Head of Engineering) per month.
futureOutlook: Demand is strong in the power sector (generation, transmission) and the construction industry (building electrical systems). Engineers with expertise in power system protection, high-voltage engineering, and renewable energy integration are highly sought after.
